block.p: I want a lavish funeral and don't want to spend my own money on it.

But in return for generous support from the funeral industry, I can offer an A-list of big-spending friends who will most certainly need funeral-related services in the future. Furthermore, I'm willing to offer funeral parlors, morticians, florists, hearse companies and mercy-dinner caterers advertising space in the prayer booklet distributed at my funeral Mass.
A spokesman from some life insurance firm may even offer a tasteful sales pitch during the eulogies. And I'll certainly have a gravestone large enough to sport several corporate logos.
